mapper.sql: announcements_id, announcements_date, announcements_notifier, announcements_content, announcements_notifierId, announcements_topic, announcements_state
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM oas_announcementsextent a left join oas_announcements b on a.announcementsExtent_announcementsId = b.announcements_id) a left join oas_department b on a.announcementsExtent_departmentId = b.dep_id) a left join oas_staff b on a.dep_id = b.staff_depID WHERE staff_id = #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ${field} like ${content}
mapper.insert: insert into oas_announcements (announcements_id, announcements_date, announcements_notifier, announcements_content, announcements_notifierId, announcements_topic, announcements_state) values (#{announcementsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{announcementsDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{announcementsNotifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{announcementsContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{announcementsNotifierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{announcementsTopic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{announcementsState,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update oas_announcements
announcements_date = #{announcementsDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
announcements_notifier = #{announcementsNotifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
announcements_content = #{announcementsContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
announcements_notifierId = #{announcementsNotifierid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
announcements_topic = #{announcementsTopic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
announcements_state = #{announcementsState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where announcements_id = #{announcementsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
